Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, this item truly stands out. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $150 for it. I believe this is a fair offer that reflects the product's worth while also allowing me to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. I look forward to your response and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
